nodes.text: Below is a list of unit tests in UUI codebase which could be used as a reference. They demonstrate common use cases and tools which can be useful to implement tests.
Here is the list of commonly used mocks which can be useful in certain cases.
This 3rd party component is used in
. As well as in other components which use dropdown internally (e.g.
, etc.). It heavily relies on "layout" features of browser and therefore, we need to mock it in
. This mock needs to be added to the specific test file (feel free to copy/paste it from here).
It's needed only for snapshots. Use it for components which use React portals internally for snapshot testing.
It's useful for components which require *.svg as an input
How to fix errors like this?
Warning: An update to inside a test was not wrapped in act
How do I test only part of the object/array?

It's strongly not recommended. Such tests are fragile, e.g. it may fail after some internal changes which doesn't affect functionality of the component (e.g. CSS class renaming). Try other options instead, e.g.: adjust internal implementation of the component (assign role, add title, add label, etc.) or add
